job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtBuild and enhance media mix models to connect the impact of marketing drivers and business shortterm and longterm outcomesltligtltligtDevelop optimization and simulation algorithms to guide the marketing investment and allocation recommendations to stakeholdersltligtltligtScale current Python modeling algorithm through parallel processing or other efficiency enhancementltligtltligtDesign and execute AB tests and other experimentsltligtltligtExplain complex modeling approaches in simple terms and develop compelling narratives that connect modeling results with business problemsltligtltligtPartner with crossfunctional team to streamline data science solutionsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtMinimum QualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtPhD degree in Statistics Engineering Operations Research Computer Science Economics Mathematics Physics or related fieldltligtltligtIndustry experience in building market mix and multitouch attribution modelsltligtltligt8 years of experience in MMM measurement AB testing marketing strategy ampamp analyticsltligtltligtExperience with advertising measurement andor digital marketing analyticsltligtltligtExperience with advertising technology platforms Ad servers DSPs DMPsltligtltligtProficient coding skills PythonSQL and database knowledgeltligtltligtExtensive experience with predictive modeling algorithmsltligtltligtStrong project management skillsltligtltligtCommunicate technical material to a range of audiences and to tell a story that provides insight into the businessltligtltligtYou have a passion for working in a fastpaced agile environmentltligtltligtA collaborative mindset and a sense of curiosityltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
